podcastTemplate.title: Swadeshi Indology Conferences
podcastTemplate.description:
इच्छन्ति देवाः सुन्वन्तं न स्वप्नाय स्पृहयन्ति
न स्वप्नाय स्पृहयन्ति ।

The very first Swadeshi Indology conference was held at IIT Madras from 6-8th July 2016. The conference was organized by Prof KS Kannan from Jain University, Bangalore and was inspired by Rajiv Malhotra’s book 'The Battle for Sanskrit' which was a purva-paksha of the entire body of work of Prof Sheldon Pollock at Columbia University, NYC. The conference was essentially a uttar-paksha or a rebuttal of specific papers of Pollock which was chosen by the organizers. This podcast contains audios onwards from the first conference.

Topics: Swadeshi Indology Conference, Rajiv Malhotra, Sheldon Pollock, Prof KS Kannan

For original source please visit https://rajivmalhotra.com/ and https://swadeshiindology.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RajivMalhotra.Official/ 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk85J3pqkn1y--k2wNMbthA

- Rajiv Malhotra Volunteers.
podcastTemplate.author: Rajiv Malhotra
